definition: lit. all the stars revolve around Polaris 北辰[Bei3 chen2] (idiom, from Analects); fig. to view sb as core figure/to group around a revered leader
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
